welcome_messages.title: Welcome to Sossh Soundboard
welcome_messages.message: This application lets you play audio through your microphone, allowing others in your voice chats, games, or meetings to hear the sounds you choose to play. Click the arrow button for usage instructions.

welcome_messages.title: Setting up the Soundboard
welcome_messages.message:
To let others hear your soundboard audio:
   (1) Open the app you're using (e.g., Discord, a game).
   (2) Go to Audio Settings.
   (3) Set your input device to: CABLE Input (VB-Audio Virtual Cable)
